mapper.select: SELECT * FROM address WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY is_default DESC, created_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address (user_id, recipient_name, phone, address_detail, is_default,created_by,created_time, updated_by, updated_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{recipientName}, #{phone}, #{addressDetail}, #{isDefault},#{createdBy},NOW(), #{updatedBy}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET recipient_name = #{recipientName}, phone = #{phone}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}, is_default = #{isDefault}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE address SET is_default = FALSE WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE address SET is_default = TRUE WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM address WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_default = TRUE LIMIT 1
